props.text:
**Optimized store framework** 
 Free your front-end with our React + Node store framework. Improve usability and SEO, while driving more conversion with modular components, single page applications, and a ready-for-PWA structure. 
 **Multi-currency and language** 
 Go international with multiple storefronts to support different languages and easily manage local currencies and payment conditions. 
 **Serverless development platform** 
 Reduce loading time, improve usability, and make the best out of SEO. Developing scalable components with a comprehensive, easy-to-use toolset, you can build stores faster than ever.
Thanks for reaching out! We will come back shortly.

## Keeping your food fresh Fridge Freezers

Designed with quality and reliability in mind, our range of [freestanding fridge freezers](https://www.beko.co.uk/appliances/refrigerators/fridge-freezers/freestanding) and [integrated fridge freezers](https://www.beko.co.uk/appliances/refrigerators/fridge-freezers/freestanding) keep your food fresher for longer with innovative technology like [HarvestFresh](https://www.beko.co.uk/harvestfresh), which preserves the vitamins in your fresh fruit and veg in the crisper drawer. Whilst our FreezerGuard technology means your appliance can be kept anywhere in your home, even [the garage](https://www.beko.co.uk/appliances/refrigerators/fridge-freezers/outdoor-fridge-freezers-for-garages), our [Frost-Free](https://www.beko.co.uk/appliances/refrigerators/fridge-freezers/frost-free) technology means you wont have to waste time manually defrosting your fridge freezer. Looking for more information? Check out our detailed [fridge freezer buying guide](https://www.beko.co.uk/support/buying-guides/fridge-freezer). Or, if youre looking to make a statement in your home, check out our [American-style fridge freezer buying guide](https://www.beko.co.uk/support/buying-guides/american-style-fridge-freezer). For added peace of mind, selected appliances are eligible for the 10 Year Parts Guarantee.

## Designed with quality and reliability in mind, our range of [freestanding fridge freezers](https://www.beko.co.uk/appliances/refrigerators/fridge-freezers/freestanding) and [integrated fridge freezers](https://www.beko.co.uk/appliances/refrigerators/fridge-freezers/freestanding) keep your food fresher for longer with innovative technology like [HarvestFresh](https://www.beko.co.uk/harvestfresh), which preserves the vitamins in your fresh fruit and veg in the crisper drawer. Whilst our FreezerGuard technology means your appliance can be kept anywhere in your home, even [the garage](https://www.beko.co.uk/appliances/refrigerators/fridge-freezers/outdoor-fridge-freezers-for-garages), our [Frost-Free](https://www.beko.co.uk/appliances/refrigerators/fridge-freezers/frost-free) technology means you wont have to waste time manually defrosting your fridge freezer. Looking for more information? Check out our detailed [fridge freezer buying guide](https://www.beko.co.uk/support/buying-guides/fridge-freezer). Or, if youre looking to make a statement in your home, check out our [American-style fridge freezer buying guide](https://www.beko.co.uk/support/buying-guides/american-style-fridge-freezer). ## Making appliances designed to make your life easier

As well as being the leading home appliance brand in the UK, we are the second largest home appliance brand in Western Europe and one of Europe's fastest growing large home appliance brands, available in 130+ countries worldwide.
*The UKs number one large home appliance brand.

# Working together to help the most disadvantaged children and families in communities in the UK. Since 2014 we have donated over 200,000 and provided over 800 appliances to families, as well as young people leaving care.

# Working together to help the most disadvantaged children and families in communities in the UK. Since 2014 we have donated over 200,000 and provided over 800 appliances to families, as well as young people leaving care.

## We strive to minimise the impact we have on the environment. With the biggest part of our carbon emissions resulting from the use of our products by our customers, we not only need to look at how we produce our products and the materials we use, but we also need to ensure we are bringing energy-efficient products to the market. As a company, we are committed to improving the average energy efficiency of our products year after year.

## Recycling 
A new lease of life for plastic

## We are also working to increase the use of recycled materials within our appliances. Our washing machines, tumble dryers, cookers, and dishwashers now feature parts made from recycled materials, including plastic bottles and discarded fishing nets. By transforming waste materials for use in our appliances, we are taking small steps to reduce the embedded carbon footprint of our products, whilst also promoting the circularity of materials.

## Transforming waste material
 For healthy living, on a healthy planet

## Using innovative technology, we recycle fishing nets and industrial thread waste, transforming them into high-performance materials used in the door dcor plastic, display cover, and inner plastic display cover of our RecycledNet ovens. As a company, we have set a target for there to be 40% recycled plastic in all products by 2030. This target will be reached without compromising the quality or reliability of our appliances.

props.headline: ## Refrigeration Buying Guide
props.subhead: Whether you have a small kitchen, a big kitchen, or are after the latest technologies, our refrigeration buying guide will help you find the best model from our range of fridges and freezers to help you enjoy the food you love every day.

props.text:
## Flame Retardant Backs
On all current refrigeration products  [Read more](/#)

Enjoy the food you love with the UKs largest range of quality fridges and freezers. With over 30 years of experience producing reliable refrigeration appliances, our range of stylish fridges and fridge freezers feature the latest cooling technologies that work to save valuable time and effort. Whether you need a fridge that helps keep food fresh for up to 30 days, or a freezer that works in your garage, discover the perfect appliance for you in our fridge and freezer range. For added peace of mind, selected models feature our 10 Year Parts Guarantee.

**Since 2007, all refrigeration products have been manufactured using a flame retardant back.**

### American Style
Lots of space and packed with technology to preserve the freshness of your food.

props.label: American Style Fridge Freezers with Plumbed Water & Ice Dispensers
American Style Fridge Freezers with Non-Plumbed Water

props.text:
### Multi-Door
Stylish design balanced with innovative technology to save you time and keep food fresh.

### Fridge Freezers
Fridge freezers to suit every kitchen, with clever features to save you time, space and energy.

### Fridges
Fridges packed with the latest technology that ensures your food stays fresh.

### Freezers
Frost free and manual defrost options, designed to save you time and energy.
## Simulating the Natural 24 Hour Sun Cycle

props.headline: ## Flexible cooling or freezing with MultiZone technology
props.subhead: Whether you need more fridge space for a summer barbeque or need more freezer space for Christmas, this compartment can become either at the touch of a button.

props.text:
## No more defrosting thanks to Frost Free technology
Our freezers leave no chance for ice to build up thanks to an automatic fan which removes warm air that enters your freezer each time you open the door.
